p.intro: Welcome to {{app}}. By accessing or using this platform, you agree to be bound by the following Terms of Service.
p.usage1: Use the service only for lawful purposes and in compliance with applicable laws. You are responsible for all activities under your account.
p.account1: You must keep your credentials confidential. Notify us immediately of any security breach.
p.usercontent1: You warrant that data, documents, and content you submit are accurate, lawful, and that you have the rights to use them.
p.ip1: All marks, logos, UI, and materials are owned by {{app}} or licensors. Copying, modifying, or distributing without written permission is prohibited.
p.fees1: If paid services apply, details of fees, taxes, and billing terms will be provided prior to any transaction.
p.liability1: {{app}} is not liable for indirect damages, data loss, or service interruptions beyond our reasonable control.
p.law1: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Indonesia. Disputes shall be resolved amicably first; failing which, through competent courts/arbitration.
p.changes1: We may update these terms from time to time. The latest version applies upon publication.

user.p: Any individual or entity that accesses or uses {{app}}.

shipper.p: A user who creates shipment requests.

transporter.p: A user who provides fleet/logistics services.

platform.p: The applications, site, and related services operated by {{app}}.

usage.i1: Do not engage in fraud, abuse, or transaction manipulation.
usage.i2: Do not compromise system integrity, networks, or data security.
usage.i3: Follow operational terms, policies, and published technical guidelines.

account.i1: Do not share your password with others.
account.i2: Keep your devices secure and up to date.
account.i3: You are responsible for all activities performed through your account.

prohibited.i1: Illegal activities, including money laundering or fraud.
prohibited.i2: Unauthorized data extraction (scraping) or reverse engineering.
prohibited.i4: Violating privacy or intellectual property rights of others.

p.intro: This policy explains how {{app}} collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
p.retention1: We retain data as long as necessary for the purposes stated or as required by applicable laws.
p.sharing1: We do not sell personal data. We may share data with trusted partners (e.g., payments, notifications, tracking) under confidentiality agreements.
p.transfer1: Where data is processed outside your jurisdiction, we ensure safeguards aligned with applicable standards.
p.security1: We apply technical and organizational controls to prevent unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
p.cookies1: We may use cookies for authentication, preferences, and analytics. You can manage preferences via your browser settings.
p.children1: The service is not intended for children below the age defined by local law. We do not knowingly collect children’s data.
p.changes1: We may update this policy and will announce updates via the app or site.

legalbasis.i2: Performance of a contract/service you request.

collect.i2: Logistics operations & transaction data (origin/destination, cargo details, schedules).
collect.i3: Technical data (IP address, device type, access logs).

use.i1: To provide and operate the service.

rights.i1: Access and obtain a copy of your personal data.
rights.i3: Withdraw consent and object to processing.
rights.i4: Lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
